TopicTitle: Which solar system replacer to use in .90?

Articles.Content:
As my save does not wish to transfer from .25 to .90, I was wondering if I could do my ships "transfer" a little different. So, I'm looking for a working solar system replacer, or solar system added (so Kerbol + 1) to start a new game in.

I'm a little confused on how to go about it though. Mainly I just want ready made system, but not one just adding new planets to Kerbol, but an actual separate/different system. Which mod is best for that?
